templates.content: We strongly recommend you clear your cache. After doing so, click forgot password through the home page of HEYDUDE, and you will receive a link for resetting your password. Make sure to check your spam and junk inbox to see the email verification. Let me know how that goes!

templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text and the fastest way to get help with your order is to email us at customerservice@heydude.com. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.content:
We're committed to offering you exclusive offers and promotions, which may change on a daily basis. Due to our constantly changing exclusive offers and promotions, we do not offer post-purchase price adjustments on any items purchased.

Exclusive offers and promotion sale codes are only applicable during the time displayed for the sale. We do not offer rain checks on items that are out of stock during any sale or promotional period.
templates.name: Do you offer price adjustments?

templates.content: Currently, all HEYDUDE shoes are only offered in full sizes. I'd recommended reading the suggested sizing tips on each product page as well as taking a look at our size guide here: https://www.heydude.com/pages/size-guide
templates.name: Do your shoes come in half sizes?

templates.content: I'd recommend following the cleaning instructions at the following link: https://www.heydude.com/pages/cleaning-your-hey-dude-shoes
templates.name: How do I clean my canvas shoes?

templates.content: I'm afraid we don't offer international shipping at the moment.
templates.name: Do you ship internationally?

templates.content: You can start your return here: https://returns.heydude.com/
templates.name: How do I start a return?

templates.content: Our processing time takes 2 business days and once shipped it will take 3-7 business days for domestic orders.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Instant Credit comes with no strings attached. Any unused portion of the Credit will be refunded back to your original payment method.
templates.name: What happens if I don’t use my “Instant Credit”?

templates.content: Yes! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://connect.studentbeans.com/v4/hosted/heydude/us
templates.name: Do you have a student discount?

templates.content: As of July 1, 2022, The Colorado Department of Revenue implemented a new non-refundable $0.27 delivery fee that we're required to collect on shipments to an address in Colorado. The fee is collected once per order and will be reflected on your order confirmation email. Qualifying requests for refunds will be processed minus the non-refundable delivery fee.
templates.name: What is the Colorado retail delivery fee?

templates.content: You'll use your Instant Credit code at checkout, similar to a gift card. The Credit amount will be for the amount of the items being returned. If you use Credit and the price of the new order is less than your Credit amount, you will be refunded the remaining amount to your original payment method.
templates.name: How do I use “Instant Credit”?

templates.content: Our shoes weight starts at only 5oz (150 grams), so about the same as a couple of pairs of socks!
templates.name: How much do the shoes weigh?

templates.content: Please visit our return center: https://heydude.returnly.com/ You will need to select 'Returning a Gift' and follow the prompts. You may exchange for a different item, but if requesting a refund, please note that it will be returned on original payment.

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and apply for our affiliate program here: https://www.heydude.com/pages/affiliate-program For other collaboration inquiries please email us at social@heydudeshoes.com. Our team is happy to chat!
templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program

templates.content: While processing a return via the Returns Center, you may be offered an Instant Credit code along with a prepaid shipping label. If you do receive a code, you can use this Credit to buy something new without having to wait for your return refund. Once we receive your original item(s), we'll deactivate any unused Credit and refund the outstanding balance back to your original payment method.

templates.content: I'm afraid not. We cannot issue refunds for in-store purchases. Please contact the retailer you purchased from for any returns or exchanges.

templates.content: If eligible, you'll get your refund typically in 10-14 business days. Please note that it may take additional time to post your account depending on your bank or financial institution.
templates.name: How soon will I get my refund?

templates.content: First of all, thanks for your order! Second, you can actually track your order whenever you want by visiting https://www.heydude.com/pages/track-your-order In case you have an issue with an existing order, the fastest way to get help is by emailing us at customerservice@heydude.com!
templates.name: Order Status requests

templates.content: You can easily initiate an exchange through the portal here: https://returns.heydude.com/ Please select the "received wrong item" option and we will immediately send you a return label and process your exchange. If your item was marked final sale, please contact us at customerservice@heydude.com.
templates.name: What if I was shipped the wrong merchandise/products?

templates.content: Thanks for reaching out! Unfortunately, we are not able to cancel or modify orders once they are placed. If any adjustments need to be made once you receive your order we are happy to help with any returns or exchanges!
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $50 (excluding Hawaii and Alaska). Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: I'm afraid discount codes cannot be applied to items marked as Back in Stock.
templates.name: My code won't apply to the Back in Stock item in my cart

templates.content: The purchaser can make the request for the purchased value or unused balance. Refunds can only be returned to the original payment method. Please contact customer service at customerservice@heydude.com for assistance.
templates.name: Can I return or exchange a gift card?

templates.content:
Items we do not accept back:

- Anything worn, altered or washed
- Shoes that are dirty and more specifically to the outsole, scuffed, worn or returned with missing pieces (This includes any dirt on the outsole)
- Items purchased in store or authorized retailers
- Free gifts or promotional items with retail value 
- Accessories such as Insoles or laces
- Items marked final sale

Please note that if your return comes back to us in any of the stated conditions, it will be considered ineligible for return.
templates.name: What is not accepted as a return?

templates.content: We believe that packaging is the most wasteful thing in the retail industry. Because we love our environment and believe in doing our part, a large percentage of our packaging is made from cornstarch. Our 100% Cornstarch Polybags are biodegradable and will disintegrate over time. Currently, we are in the process of transitioning into having all our shoes packaged in these Eco-friendly Polybags, which is why some of our shoes do not come in boxes. We truly appreciate your support in our decision to be environmentally friendly.
templates.name: Why didn't I get the shoes in box?

templates.content:
We stand behind all of our shoes.  If your item has arrived defective or flawed, and it's been less than 60 days since your purchase, please contact our customer service team at customerservice@heydude.com. 

You can also check out our warranty policy for additional details: https://www.heydude.com/pages/warranty-policy
templates.name: What if my item arrived damaged or defective?
